document_data.caption: A map showing the location of the Ship's Wheel on Diamond Street.
document_data.name: The Ship's Wheel
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ship's Wheel''' was a tavern located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the western section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the north side of [[Diamond Street]] where it joined [[Westwall Street]] near the [[West Gate]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The front of the tavern was adorned with a shining ship's wheel sized to be used by a [[titan]]. The Ship's Wheel was a two story building.
document_data.Activities: The Ship's Wheel had a reputation for being one of the safest taverns around. Most activity within the tavern never got more exciting than the old patrons watching each others hair fall out.
document_data.Inhabitants: The tavern was owned by a man named [[Olhin Shalut]].
